name: Robert Pattinson
bio: Robert Douglas Thomas Pattinson is an English actor. Known for his roles in both blockbuster and independent films, he has featured in the Forbes Celebrity 100 list. Time magazine named him one of the 100 most influential people in the world.

name: Zoë Kravitz
bio: Zoë Isabella Kravitz is an American actress, singer, and model. The daughter of actor-musician Lenny Kravitz and actress Lisa Bonet, she made her acting debut in the romantic comedy film No Reservations (2007).

name: michael b jordan
bio: A versatile actor known for his compelling performances in various genres.

name: Ryan Reynolds
bio: Ryan Rodney Reynolds is a Canadian actor. Known for his work in comedies and action films, he has starred in films such as National Lampoon's Van Wilder (2002), Waiting... (2005), and Deadpool (2016).

name: Robert Downey Jr.
bio: Robert John Downey Jr. is an American actor. His career has been characterized by critical and popular success in his youth, followed by a period of substance abuse and legal troubles, and a resurgence of commercial success in middle age.

name: Chris Hemsworth
bio: Christopher Hemsworth is an Australian actor. He rose to prominence playing Kim Hyde in the Australian television series Home and Away (2004–2007) before embarking on a film career in Hollywood.

name: Matthew McConaughey
bio: Matthew David McConaughey is an American actor. He first gained notice for his supporting performance in the coming-of-age comedy Dazed and Confused (1993).

name: Chadwick Boseman
bio: Chadwick Aaron Boseman was an American actor. During his career, Boseman was honored with two Screen Actors Guild Awards, a Critics' Choice Movie Award, a Golden Globe Award, and a Primetime Emmy Award.

name: Benedict Cumberbatch
bio: Benedict Timothy Carlton Cumberbatch is an English actor. He has received various accolades, including a Primetime Emmy Award, a British Academy Television Award, and a Laurence Olivier Award.

name: Henry Cavill
bio: Henry William Dalgliesh Cavill is a British actor. He is best known for his role as Superman in the DC Extended Universe and Geralt of Rivia in the Netflix series The Witcher.

name: Pedro Pascal
bio: José Pedro Balmaceda Pascal is a Chilean-born American actor. He is known for portraying paternalistic characters, notably Joel Miller in The Last of Us and Din Djarin in The Mandalorian. His notable roles also include Oberyn Martell in Game of Thrones and Javier Peña in the Netflix crime series Narcos.
